Standardized error message for missing vars in a data frame

msg_missing_vars.Rd

Generates a detailed error message for when required variables are missing from a data frame.

Usage

msg_missing_vars(df, vars, property = NULL, i = TRUE)

Arguments

df

(character[1]) Name of a data frame.

vars

(character) Names of missing variables.

property

(character[1] | NULL) Name of the property being checked (default: NULL).

i

(logical[1]) Whether to include an informational message about checking available variables (default: TRUE).

Value

(character[3]) Suitable for use with rlang::abort().

See also

Other msg: msg_invalid_values()
